title: Onsen Musume
synopsis: Onsen god Sukunahiko gathered together in a girls’ school nine girls known as “Onsen Musume,” apprentice goddesses who dwell in the onsens all around Japan. As the girls looked on in nervous anticipation, Sukunahiko began explaining why he had called them all together. “I want you nine girls to become an idol group…” Onsen tourist destinations that Japan boasts to the world have been seeing decreasing tourism each year due to the changing times. If circumstances continue as they are, onsen locations may be forced to close. “With the same hospitality as at onsens, become idols and bestow healing and smiles to everyone! And recover Japan’s onsens to their former glory!” Thus, in order to save the country’s onsen crisis, the Onsen Musume begin their journey toward idol stardom. (by Tokyo Otaku Mode)
